seo.title: Generate Course
seo.keywords: course generation, AI learning, custom education
seo.descriptionPreview: Preview your AI-generated course before creation

title: Generate Course
description: Type the topic on which you want to generate course. Also, you can enter a list of subtopics, which are the specifics you want to learn.

validation.topicMinLength: Topic must be at least 3 characters

goPremium.title: Go Premium
goPremium.description: Access all features with a Premium upgrade.

upgradeToPremium.title: Upgrade to Premium
upgradeToPremium.description: You are limited to adding only 5 subtopics.

coursePage.notesPlaceholder: No notes yet. Start taking notes for this course.

teacher.defaultMessage: Hey there! I'm your AI teacher. If you have any questions about your {{topic}} course, whether it's about videos, images, or theory, just ask me. I'm here to clear your doubts.
teacher.promptPrefix: I have a doubt about this topic: {{topic}}. Please clarify my doubt in very short:

noteSaved.title: Note saved
noteSaved.description: Your note has been saved successfully.

email.subject: Completion Certificate
email.message: We are pleased to inform you that you have successfully completed the {{topic}} and are now eligible for your course completion certificate. Congratulations on your hard work and dedication throughout the course!

pdf.visitTopic: Please visit {{topic}} topic to export as PDF. Only topics that are completed will be added to the PDF.

started.title: Quiz started
started.description: Good luck! You have {{minutes}} minutes to complete the quiz.

completed.title: Quiz completed
completed.description: Your answers have been submitted. Check your results below.

generate.title: Generate Course
generate.subtitle: Create a personalized course with AI
